hopobject.name: Beagle3GRouter
hopobject.body:
-Ideal for users unable to get conventional adsl or cable broadband
-Share your 3G broadband via Ethernet or wireless
-Access to Internet for temporary locations, as an alternative to fixed line solutions
hopobject.shortdesc: The BeagleBoard will use a 3G USB modem to provide a 3G broadband connection and enables to connect computers, smartphone or laptops by either wired or wireless connections to the internet.
